name: Cintas Corporation
description: Cintas Corporation is a leading provider of corporate identity uniforms and related business services. Founded in 1968 and headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, Cintas specializes in designing, manufacturing, and implementing uniform programs for businesses across various industries. The company offers a wide range of products and services, including uniforms, floor mats, restroom supplies, first aid and safety products, and fire protection services. Cintas is dedicated to helping organizations project a professional image while also enhancing workplace safety and efficiency. The company operates a network of facilities and distribution centers to ensure timely service and delivery, allowing clients to focus on their core operations. With a strong commitment to customer service and quality, Cintas has established itself as a trusted partner for businesses looking to enhance their brand through uniform programs. The company is also committed to sustainability and has implemented several initiatives aimed at reducing its environmental impact. Cintas continues to grow through strategic acquisitions and expansions, solidifying its position as a market leader in the uniform rental and service industry.

seo.meta_title: Cintas Corporation | Corporate Uniforms and Business Services
seo.meta_description: Discover Cintas Corporation, a leader in corporate identity uniforms and business services. Explore our wide range of products and services designed to enhance workplace safety and professionalism.

faq.question: What services does Cintas provide?
faq.answer: Cintas provides corporate identity uniforms, facility services, first aid and safety products, and fire protection services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cintas?
faq.answer: Scott D. Farmer is the CEO of Cintas Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Cintas headquartered?
faq.answer: Cintas is headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: What types of uniforms does Cintas offer?
faq.answer: Cintas offers a variety of uniforms including corporate uniforms, medical scrubs, and food service uniforms.
